QuestData.Title: Attack by Air!
QuestData.Description: They have seen the might of the Horde by land, now they must feel it from the air! I want you to report to Valnok Windrager at once! You will find him here, in Agmar's Hammer.$B$BValnok has already been briefed on your mission and is expecting you.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Valnok Windrager at Agmar's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: <Valnok salutes.>$B$BSo you're the hot shot, eh?
